meanings: keep the flower-beds free of weeds

vlive.korean: 잡초도 주워가는데? Why are they picking up grass? 듣기 View video NCT : 태용시~~💚💚💚
vlive.english: Why are they picking up grass?

vlive.korean: 여기에 잡초를 뽑는다 이렇게 생각하시면 돼요. Just think that you're pulling weed. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK! HOW TO in V] 더보이즈 Q의 Text Me Back 추는 법☁️ (HOW TO DANCE THE BOYZ Q’s Text Me Back)
vlive.english: Just think that you're pulling weed.

vlive.korean: 제가 꽃인가요? - 네 우리의... - 저는 잡초입니다. I'm a flower? - Yes, our... - I'm the weeds. 듣기 View video V Special : <진리상점> 랜선 개업식 in 설리 대표님방 LIVE
vlive.english: I'm a flower? - Yes, our... - I'm the weeds.

vlive.korean: 잡초 인정. - 잡초가... I approve that. - Weed... 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 - THE BEAT SEASON 4 -08- '은광 형님 생일 대잔치'
잡초 씻기? Washing the weeds? 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 - THE BEAT SEASON 4 -07- '비비현식의 겟잇뷰티'

examples.korean: I’ve been weeding the flower beds. 발음듣기 난 화단에서 잡초를 뽑고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ve been weeding the flower beds. 발음

examples.korean: Weeds grew through the cracks in the paving. 발음듣기 포장된 도로 표면의 틈 사이로 잡초가 자라나 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Weeds grew through the cracks in the paving. 발음

examples.korean: Their garden is a wilderness of grass and weeds. 발음듣기 그들의 정원은 온갖 잡초들만 무성한 버려진 땅이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Their garden is a wilderness of grass and weeds. 발음

examples.korean: Clear the soil of weeds and fork in plenty of compost. 발음듣기 흙에서 잡초를 없애고 쇠스랑을 써서 퇴비를 듬뿍 넣어 주시오. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Clear the soil of weeds and fork in plenty of compost. 발음

examples.korean: The yard was overgrown with weeds. 발음듣기 뜰에는 잡초가 우거져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The yard was overgrown with weeds. 발음
